item.description:
1. Meta debuts a tool for watermarking AI-generated videos  TechCrunch
  2. Meta releases AI model to enhance Metaverse experience  Reuters
  3. Meta rolls out internal AI tool as it pushes into business market  Financial Times
  4. Meta rolls out Metamate AI tool for employees; aims to create ‘world’s best enterprise assistant’  The Times of India
